Some of you may have noticed that there’s a new player in the CRISPR gene
editing field, Beam Therapeutics, which IPOed last year and has rocketed from
~$20 a share to currently about ~$120 a share. Suddenly Cathie Wood of ARK is
adding it to her ARKK and ARKG funds

Meanwhile they make no money and…
